text: CEE Property Development Portfolio B.V. (CPDP) is a closed-end real estate investment fund registered in the Netherlands.http://cpdp.eu/about- company.aspx It is part of consolidated financial statements of Erste Group's subsidiary Česká spořitelna.Annual report of Česká spořitelna for 2009, page 178 In October 2015 Česká spořitelna announced it intends to liquidate the fund.E15, Česká spořitelna vyprodává reality, front page Since its launch in September 2004 its assets are managed by company CEE Asset Management (CEE AM).Klára Gajdušková (Česká spořitelna), Petra Zdeňková (Sekyra Group), Na trh vstupuje první český realitní fond CPDP (press release), 22 September 2004Commercial register at justice.cz, identification number (IČ) 27102203, CEE Asset Management s.r.o.Annual report of Česká spořitelna for 2004, pages 24 and 69 CEE AM used to be a subsidiary of real estate development company Sekyra Group managed by Luděk Sekyra, since April 2008 it was owned by Jersey- based CEE ASSET MANAGEMENT LIMITED. After its incorporation CPDP purchased company Roztyly Centrum, owner of administrative building leased by T-Mobile Czech Republic, and company Gallery MYŠÁK owning a real estate in downtown of Prague. In August 2006 the fund founded a subsidiary CPDP Jungmannova, which in turn acquired from Sekyra Group company Mrázovka II, owning administrative building Golden Cross on Jungmann square in Prague.Annual reports of CPDP Jungmannova and Mrázovka II for years 2006-2007 In April 2007 CPDP acquired 20% stake in project Central Park Praha.Česká spořitelna, Nabídkový program investičních certifikátů a warrantů, 21. May 2007, table no. 10 In February 2009 the fund subscribed newly issued shares of company CPP Lux and as a result increased its share in project Central Park Praha to 99,9%.Minutes from extraordinary general meeting of CPP Lux S.ar.l. assembled on 12 February 2009. CPDP subscribed 15.000.000 shares with nominal value 1 euro and increased its stake to 99,93 % (15.002.500/15.012.500)Vladimír Kaláb, Olga Skalková, Central Park Praha - od "projektu snů" utíkají klienti, HN.IHNED.CZ 15 January 2010, ("180 out of 340 clients cancelled the purchase contrants for flats in projects Central Park Praha.")Kateřina Menzelová, Deset tisíc neprodaných bytů v Praze. Proč masově nezlevní?, Česká pozice, 2. February 2011 ("Only a third from the 540 flats is sold. The prices decreased from more than CZK 100 thousand per square meter to CZK 64 - 85 thousand per square meter.")http://www.iscs.cz/files/documents/infocentrum/Jine/ZAKON_POVINN_ctvrtletni/spolecnost/IS_090930.pdf In December 2009 Česká spořitelna recognised a provision of CZK 1.8 billion against its ownership interest in CPDP. In August 2010 daily E15 reported about attempt of CPDP to sell companies from its real estate portfolio.Denisa Novotná, Tereza Zavadilová, Spořitelna se zbavuje budov za miliardy korun, No 690, 16 August 2010, front pagehttp://www.tyden.cz/rubriky/byznys/reality/ceska-sporitelna-prodava- nemovitosti-za-miliardy_178484.html {| border="1" class="wikitable" |+ Subsidiaries of CPDP, ownership equity as of 31 December 2009 in million CZKCommercial register at justice.cz and corresponding annual reports published therehttp://cpdp.eu/spv.aspx ! subsidiary !! share !! acquired in !! ownership equity !! real estate !! notes |- !
